title: Bobby Meeting His Girlfriend’s Parents + Hillary Scott Says Lady Antebellum Connects With Zoom + Favorite Movie Assignments
itunes:title: Bobby Meeting His Girlfriend’s Parents + Hillary Scott Says Lady Antebellum Connects With Zoom + Favorite Movie Assignments
description:
Bobby is driving to meet up with his girlfriend's parents in the park to swap out some 'goods' for his girlfriend. They will be practicing social distancing, but he'll be meeting them for the first time. Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum calls in to talk about her quarantine family life and the band. Plus, we all pick movies for each other to watch by next week!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
